message.original: 剛剣の証 ウォリアー戦術試練
message.translation: Warrior Tactics Trial: A Strong Sword

message.original: ウォリアーの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to learn the basic tactics of Warrior, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

message.original: 空破斬で敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Aerial Hack

message.original: 魔人斬りで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Savage Lash

message.original: 耐魔の身構えでリベンジゲージを貯めろ
message.translation: Charge the revenge gauge with Brace.

message.original: リベンジゲージ最大の魔人斬りで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with Savage Lash with a full Revenge Gauge

message.original: 最奥のサイクロプスにしがみつき魔倒斬りせよ
message.translation: Cling to the Cyclops in the deeper chamber and use Inverse Slash.

message.original: 最奥にある＜剛剣の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the proof of completing the trial

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
